last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: Maryam and Catherine speak up at the investigation panel, Helen is presented with an offer, and all three women make decisions about the future.

name: Maternal
overview: Maryam, a Paediatric Registrar, Catherine, a General and Trauma Surgeon, and Helen, a Registrar in Acute Medicine, each attempt to balance their increasingly demanding jobs in post-pandemic frontline medicine with their lives as new mothers.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Returning from maternity leave, Maryam finds herself immediately on the front lines, Catherine sets her sights on a consultant job, and Helen's marital problems emerge at work.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Things are looking up for Catherine as Lars flies in from Sweden to be a father to Elis. Until, that is, she discovers heâ€™s brought his hot, judgy wife Brigitta.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A routine operation takes a critical turn for Catherine, Maryam wrestles with the idea of adopting another child, and the extent of Guy's alcohol problem becomes clear to Helen.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: A gruelling night shift leads Helen to confide in Jack, and Maryam and Catherine respond to an emergency on a night out.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Motherhood throws everything at Catherine as she fights Jack for the consultant job, Maryam admits how she's feeling, and Helen makes a shocking discovery.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Maryam and Catherine speak up at the investigation panel, Helen is presented with an offer, and all three women make decisions about the future.
